author: Earl
content:
First, a beautiful panorama.  I like that you loaded the larger size.  This looks like a nice place to live.

Second, some pretty severe flares and ghosting examples.  I appreciate your posting these images as it gives a truer picture of the level of weakness of this lens.  But, as you've stated this is a common issue for a number of lens...some of which reside in my kit. ðŸ™‚
